page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: There is a very large amount of land available for recreation which is varied in size and nature. At national and international level are Lancashire Cricket Club and Manchester United AFC, both of which are in Old Trafford. Also of national reputation is Stretford Stadium which has facilities for all kinds of athletics. There are many small private clubs such as Chorlton Cricket Club and Old Hulmeians Lacrosse. The Hardy Farm site provides extensive playing fields for UMIST. Chorlton park and Longford Park provide public open space and tennis courts, bowling gteens and play areas. Finally there are larger areas of public open space, many with football pitches for general use.
